QuestData.Title: [REUSE]
QuestData.Description: I like you, youngling. You are not like the others, sitting in their fancy court, leaving old Marasmius to keep the network running.$b$bI'll open up the ring by the celestial tree nearby as a thank for all your help. You can use it to come back and visit me whenever you like.$b$bYou come back now! There will always be plenty for you to do here. Might even be something special in it for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the mycelial network to return to Shimmerbough.
